content.question: In the final two paragraphs of the passage (“The environmental . . . diversity”), the author integrates Ray Hilborn’s arguments primarily to critique the practice of

choices.label: adopting farming methods to restore wild fish populations
creating prawn farms in mangrove swamps
displacing poor villagers to create fish farms
polluting the ocean with effluent from fish farms

content.answer: adopting farming methods to restore wild fish populations

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
